The claim states that a state trooper wi: 500 a year more than a trooper with 10 minutes on the force.
State Sen: Tom Garrett, R-Buckingham, made the claim during an interview on "The John Fredericks Show" where he discussed the state budget and funding for essential functions of government.
The source of the information mentioned: the executive director of the Virginia State Police Association, a professional organization representing troopers.
